paragraphs.context: in 1977, major amendments to the US Clean Air Act created one of the first tradable emission offset mechanisms . this allowed a permitted facility to increase its emissions . in return it had to pay another company to reduce its

answers.text: in 1977, major amendments to the US Clean Air Act created one of the first tradable emission offset mechanisms . this allowed a permitted facility to increase its emissions . in return it had to pay another company to reduce its

paragraphs.context: as of 2022, 68 carbon pricing programs were in place or scheduled to be created globally . many are carbon emissions trading programs, or other types of market-oriented program involving carbon offsets and credits .

answers.text: as of 2022, 68 carbon pricing programs were in place or scheduled to be created globally . many are carbon emissions trading programs, or other types of market-oriented program involving carbon offsets and credits .

paragraphs.context: the CDM identifies over 200 types of projects suitable for generating carbon offsets and credits . land use improvement, methane capture, biomass sequestration, renewable energy and industrial energy efficiency .

qas.question: What is Types of offset projects[edit]?

answers.text: the CDM identifies over 200 types of projects suitable for generating carbon offsets and credits . land use improvement, methane capture, biomass sequestration, renewable energy and industrial energy efficiency .

paragraphs.context: many types of offset are difficult to verify because they are indirect . many reports by NGO or in the media have questioned the credibility of the various certification providers .

qas.question: What is Assuring quality and determining value[edit]?

answers.text: many types of offset are difficult to verify because they are indirect . many reports by NGO or in the media have questioned the credibility of the various certification providers .

paragraphs.context: offset and credit programs have been identified as a way for countries to meet their NDC commitments and achieve the goals of the Paris agreement . they may also help close the emissions gap identified in annual UNEP reports .
